data.message: Facebook has been a blessing to me.            I keep in touch with family and friends who lives states away, advertise my book, trying to get as many signatures as possible to open up an Epilepsy Foundation in Little Rock, and I used it to advertise the date and place of our marriage.

replies.message: What a wonderful story, Thomas! We appreciate you sharing your story with us! We’re always looking for stories to feature at Facebook Stories. If you’d like to submit your story, you can do so at http://www.facebookstories.com/yourstory. -Chantal
